name: places/ChIJAQBcKPxYwokRTHz5XzaleN8
formattedAddress: 12 E 49th St #11th, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 12 E 49th St #11th, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text:
I had an AMAZING experience with BCL. I was placed with a fantastic company and Julia made it look so easy! You can trust that this company wants you to be in the *right* position and not just any position. She is encouraging, excited, professional and great at what she does!

It's wonderful to see a woman owned and operated company doing so well and I will be using them going forward to find stellar positions in NYC.

It's wonderful to see a woman owned and operated company doing so well and I will be using them going forward to find stellar positions in NYC.

originalText.text: I’ve been to so many agencies recently but BCL Search seems to be the only one getting me interviews, especially at top notch companies! I’m so grateful to be working with Julia and Jessica, they are so thorough, professional, and consider me for jobs that are actually of interest to me!

text.text: I’ve been to so many agencies recently but BCL Search seems to be the only one getting me interviews, especially at top notch companies! I’m so grateful to be working with Julia and Jessica, they are so thorough, professional, and consider me for jobs that are actually of interest to me!

originalText.text: No help whatsoever, I was approached by the agency and did not hear back from them after coming in to their office for a over a month so I decided to reach out to them. It took two weeks for a response and then I was told there might be a job opening that would fit me and that an agent would contact me with details. I never heard from anyone since. Absolutely no correspondence with anyone and a simply a waste of time.

originalText.text: My experience with BCL search was great as they were always professional and connected me with great places to interview. Really a great team!
